lesson_title: Norwegian Keyboard Practice: Left Hand Home Row
chapter: Chapter 2: Left hand Home Row Keys
objective: Familiarize yourself with the left hand home row keys, building muscle memory and accuracy.
warm_up: Before starting, ensure your left hand is correctly placed on the home row: Little finger on 'A', Ring finger on 'S', Middle finger on 'D', Index finger on 'F'. Your thumb should rest lightly on the space bar.

exercises.name: Exercise 1: Single Key Strokes
exercises.description: Focus on pressing each home row key individually.

exercises.name: Exercise 4: Rapid Repetition
tasks: ASDF FDSA ADSF SAFD SDAF FDAS

feedback_and_tips.common_mistakes: Rushing through exercises might lead to errors. Ensure you maintain a steady pace and prioritize accuracy over speed.

cool_down: After completing the exercises, stretch each finger individually. Pull gently back on each tip, ensuring you feel a light stretch but no pain. Hold each stretch for 5 seconds.
conclusion: Great job on completing the Left Hand Home Row exercises! Return to these exercises regularly.
